sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
// IMPORT FlatList
import { Text, StyleSheet, FlatList } from 'react-native'
import { TouchableOpacity, View } from 'react-native-web'

const Versão02 = () => {
  // CREATE AN ARRAY OF OBJECTS


  return (
    <View style={styles.principalStyle}>
      <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnClearStyle}>
        <Text>C</Text>
      </TouchableOpacity>

      <Text style={styles.fakeInputStyle}>dfgdsa</Text>

      <View style={styles.viewTecladoStyle}>
        <View style={styles.viewBtnNumtyle}>
          <View style={styles.viewBtnNumHorizontalStyle}>
            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnNumberStyle}>
              <Text>7</Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>

            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnNumberStyle}>
              <Text>8</Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>

            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnNumberStyle}>
              <Text>9</Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>
          </View>

          <View style={styles.viewBtnNumHorizontalStyle}>
            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnNumberStyle}>
              <Text>4</Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>

            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnNumberStyle}>
              <Text>5</Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>

            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnNumberStyle}>
              <Text>6</Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>
          </View>

          <View style={styles.viewBtnNumHorizontalStyle}>
            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnNumberStyle}>
              <Text>1</Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>

            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnNumberStyle}>
              <Text>2</Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>

            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnNumberStyle}>
              <Text>3</Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>
          </View>

          <View style={styles.viewBtnNumHorizontalStyle}>
            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnNumberStyle}>
              <Text>0</Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>

            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnResStyle}>
              <Text>=</Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>
          </View>
        </View>

        <View style={styles.ViewBtnOperadoresStyle}>
          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnOperadoresStyle}>
            <Text>+</Text>
          </TouchableOpacity>

          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnOperadoresStyle}>
            <Text>-</Text>
          </TouchableOpacity>
          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnOperadoresStyle}>
            <Text>x</Text>

          </TouchableOpacity>
          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.btnOperadoresStyle}>
            <Text>/</Text>

          </TouchableOpacity>
        </View>
      </View>

    </View>
  )
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  principalStyle: {
    padding: 20,
    width: '100%',
    height: '100%',
    
  },
  fakeInputStyle: {
    borderWidth: 2,
    fontSize: 25,
  },
  viewTecladoStyle: {
    flexDirection: 'row',
    width: '100%',
    justifyContent: 'space-between',
  },
  viewBtnNumtyle: {
    justifyContent: 'space-between',
    height: 300,
    width: '75%',
  },
  viewBtnNumHorizontalStyle: {
    flexDirection: 'row',
    justifyContent:  'space-between',
  },
  btnClearStyle: {
    backgroundColor: '#F8CECC',
    borderColor: '#C36B67',
    borderWidth: 2,
    width: 60,
    height: 60,
    textAlign: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
  },
  btnNumberStyle: {
    backgroundColor: '#DAE8FC',
    borderColor: '#96B0D6',
    borderWidth: 2,
    width: 60,
    height: 60,
    textAlign: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
  },
  btnResStyle: {
    backgroundColor: '#D5E8D4',
    borderColor: '#98C082',
    borderWidth: 2,
    height: 60,
    width: '60%',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    textAlign: 'center',
  },
  ViewBtnOperadoresStyle: {
    justifyContent: 'space-between',
  },
  btnOperadoresStyle: {
    backgroundColor: '#E1D5E7',
    borderColor: '#B095BC',
    textAlign: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    borderWidth: 2,
    height: 60,
    width: 60,
    
  },
  txtStyle: {
    fontSize: 20,
  }
})

export default Versão02
